column2: The Respondent-Petitioner-Appellant (hereinafter referred  to  as  the

column1: "Appellant")  has invoked the appellate jurisdiction of this Court, seeking

column2: to set aside an order dated 2nd  February 2012,  in case No.  HCRA 68/2009
of  the  Provincial  High  Court  holden  in  Colombo.  In  the  said  revision
application,  the  Appellant  sought  to  set aside  an  ejectment  order  dated
22nd  April 2009,  issued by the Magistrate's Court of Colombo  in case No.
